channel.title: Help : Need help deleting items from shop and changing prices
channel.description:
I have tried to delete items from my shop which i would like to take out or to make the prices dearer. I found the file to change it and I did so... I then compiled but it has not worked!
I also tried to add / take drops from monsters and that did not work either :/
Please help :)

item.title: Help : Need help deleting items from shop and changing prices
item.dc:creator: @TomWoolner TomWoolner
item.description:
@TomWoolner wrote:

What do you mean?

I have a shop what i want gs and 3rd age up pricing i have already changed these figures like you said… but it didnt work…

Read full topic

item.title: Help : Need help deleting items from shop and changing prices
item.dc:creator: @itai itai
item.description:
@itai wrote:

Well here is how to add shops, and if you look at it it should teach how to remove items from shops…

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

And to change item prices go to item.cfg find the item find what the price it, you we see the # for example if i had a rune 2h for 100k i would look up rune 2h in it, then I would find the amount (100000) and change it to what I want.

If you have problems copy them and show me them =D

Read full topic
